string.text: Zoom multiplier when Focusing without a weapon.
Only applies if your weapon is holstered or unequipped. Higher values mean more zoom.
Bring your weapon closer to you when Focusing while aiming.
Lower values bring the weapon sights closer to you.
Zoom multiplier when Focusing while aiming.
Works for most weapon sights. Does not work for 2D scopes. Higher values mean more zoom.
